memberdef.name: addAttrib
memberdef.initializer: { \ assert((size_t) attribCount < sizeof(attribs) / sizeof(attribs[0])); \ attribs[attribCount++] = a; \ }

memberdef.name: setAttrib
memberdef.initializer: { \ assert(((size_t) index + 1) < sizeof(attribs) / sizeof(attribs[0])); \ attribs[index++] = a; \ attribs[index++] = v; \ }

memberdef.argsstring: (const int *attribs, int attribCount, const int *values, int attrib)
memberdef.name: findPixelFormatAttribValue
